characters: motorcyclist ahead, truck on the left
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with a high wall on the right side. A motorcyclist appears ahead, moving from the right side of the road to the center. A large truck is visible on the left side of the road, moving in the same direction as the self-vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while keeping a safe distance from the motorcyclist ahead. The vehicle is also staying in its lane, ensuring it does not get too close to the truck on the left.
key_objects: 1) Front: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving from the right side to the center of the road, potentially causing the vehicle to decelerate. 2) Left side: A large truck, approximately 15 meters away, moving in the same direction, requiring the vehicle to maintain its lane position.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with a wall on the right side. A pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side and crosses the road. Shortly after, a motorcyclist emerges from the right side, from behind a wall, and crosses the vehicles path.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is driving at a consistent speed. Upon noticing the pedestrian crossing from the left side, the vehicle starts to decelerate. The motorcyclist emerging from the right side causes the vehicle to decelerate further to avoid a potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A pedestrian, approximately 10 meters away, crossing the road from left to right. 2) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 5 meters away, emerging from behind a wall and crossing the vehicles path.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a rural road. A white van on the left side of the road is gradually moving closer to the self-vehicles lane. The van appears to be merging into the self-vehicles lane, potentially causing a cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while observing the white van on the left side. The van is gradually moving closer to the self-vehicles lane, indicating a potential cut-in. The self-vehicle is preparing to decelerate if necessary to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white van, approximately 5 meters away, gradually moving closer to the self-vehicles lane, indicating a potential cut-in.
